LanguageData.RF_Gun_Mosin.label: Mosin-Nagant M91
LanguageData.RF_Gun_Mosin.description: Ancient bolt-action rifle. Probably pulled from a basement somewhere. Good range, Good power, low rate of fire.\nCaliber: 7.62x54mmR
LanguageData.Gun_AK74M_HMC.label: AK74M
LanguageData.Gun_AK74M_HMC.description: The AK74M is a selective-fire, gas-operated 5.45×39mm assault rifle, first developed in the Soviet Union by Mikhail Kalashnikov. It is officially known as Avtomat Kalashnikova (Russian: Автомат Калашникова). Medium damage, average range, rate of fire and accuracy.\nCaliber: 5.45x39 mm
LanguageData.Gun_OZ14G_HMC.label: OZ-14 Groza-4
LanguageData.Gun_OZ14G_HMC.description: The OZ-14 short assault rifle.\nCaliber: 9x39 mm
